attributes.action: create a large network of new woodland habitats all over the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need a five year plan with all goverments in the uk working together to create a large network of new woodland habitats creating corridors for wildlife to adapt to climate change

these new woodlands would be great for us humans too and they would clean the air improving our health giving the uk a much brighter future

working with landowners and conservationists we can make this happen
